content: *this elegant floral shawl dresses up any outfit perfect for cool summer evenings yarnspirations * --- *skill level * intermediate --- **gauge ** *motif * 3 \ 7 5 cm\ square --- **materials ** lily® sugar n cream® 70 9 g/2 5 oz 109 m/120 yds lily® sugar n cream® ombres 56 7 g/2 oz 86 m/95 yds solids *9 balls* or ombres *11 balls* ---
